main event: A yellow and orange light object was observed traveling in a south to north direction near Niland, California on 1 September 1963.
interesting points: The object's movement was noted to be faster than conventional aircraft,The observation lasted approximately 15 to 20 minutes with no sound and no visible trail,The object was estimated to be at an altitude of about 3,000 feet,Several witnesses reported that they could not identify the object and that no aircraft were in the vicinity,The report was received by the 3rd Command Post from a civilian source.
